meta.name: Description
meta.content: Our cloud-based services can boost your company's IT capabilities without adding hardware maintenance complexities and expensive upfront costs.
Our cloud-based services can boost your company's IT capabilities without adding hardware maintenance complexities and expensive upfront costs.

li.a: Cloud & Software-as-a-Service - Software Inventory & Usage Management

div.p: In a traditional IT model, adding new applications and expanding your infrastructure can lead to excessive operational expenses driven by:

ul.li: Complex, monolithic systems that are difficult to modify or expand
A constantly growing staff of specialists for each solution
Poor utilization levels of servers and storage, increasing your hardware, power and cooling, and data center real estate costs

div.p: Transform your organization into a highly agile machine when you combine Dell's deep industry knowledge, experienced consultants and efficient processes with cloud computing’s ease of management and low cost of deployment. Get the technology you need — without the burdens of upfront costs and complex maintenance — through services that feature on-demand scalability:

ul.li: Software as a Service (SaaS) offers always-on application availability, minus the headaches of a major purchase, dedicated hardware maintenance, and constant updates and upgrades.
Data Center as a Service enables you to pay only for the server performance or storage capacity you need, instead of adding and maintaining hardware on-site.
Desktop as a Service keeps sensitive data safe, helps your organization stay compliant and provides employees with the flexibility to work where, when and how they want.
Systems Management as a Service helps you monitor, assess and update assets across your organization.

div.p: The time has come to rethink IT. Partner with Dell and take advantage of our cloud-based services.

div.div:
Application IntegrationUnleash the true potential of your critical business applications with Dell Boomi cloud-based integration. Easily connect cloud and on-premise applications in a fraction of the time, cost and complexity of conventional integration approaches.
Cloud Application Integration With Dell BoomiView More

Cloud HostingExtend your internal data center by transitioning your VMware virtualized workloads into the Dell Cloud. Powered by VMware vCloud Datacenter Services, our vCloud data center hosting is secure, manageable and flexible.
Dell Cloud for SAP Solutions
Try Dell Cloud With VMware vCloud Data Center Service — $999

Online Backup and Restore Data loss is a serious threat to any organization. Businesses of all sizes need to protect their critical and sensitive data resources. Dell Online Backup and Restore offers rapid, intelligent off-site backup for distributed PCs.
